version_description:
4.5.5
• Routine Maintenance and enhancements.

4.5.4
• Improvements and Enhancements.

4.5.3
• General improvements and bug fixes.

New in 4.6
· SMS Verification – Upgraded account security with phone number verification via SMS.
· 3D Touch Support – Find a restaurant, order a meal, and reorder your favorites right from the app icon.
· General improvements and bug fixes

New in 4.7
· Routine Maintenance and Bug Fixes

New in 4.7.1
Schedule maintenance and Improvements

New in 4.7.2
General bug fixes and improvements

New in 4.7.3
General bug fixes and improvements

New in 4.7.4
General bug fixes and improvements

New in 4.7.5
General bug fixes and improvements

New in 4.7.6
General bug fixes and improvements

- Quickly add Chips, Chips & Guac, or a Drink to your order in the bag to complete the perfect meal.
- Manage your subscription to Chipotle Offers & News. Look for it it in your account under Preferences. You can sign up for the occasional email or text.
- We've made your pickup time clearer after you've placed an order. You can also tap the pickup address for directions to your food rendezvous.
- Fixed an issue with reordering Veggie Burrito Bowls, Thanks to Lois in CA.
- Improved tap'ability and layout of navigation icons
- Display improvements throughout the app
- Minor improvements for iPhone X
- General bug fixes

New in 4.7.7
General bug fixes and improvements

New in 4.7.8
General bug fixes and improvements

This is SO not an update -- this is a BRAND-NEW version of the Chipotle app. We’ve redesigned and rebuilt our app from the ground up, making it easier for you to order your Chipotle favorites faster than ever. You’ll be navigating intuitively with the simple swipes, flicks, and taps you’ve come to expect from a mobile app.

Build delicious burritos, bowls and tacos like a boss. Create an account to quickly reorder favorites and recent meals. Receive, store, and redeem offers right in the app. You can pay using Apple Pay, or stored credit cards and gift cards. Or breeze through and checkout as a guest. It’s the closest thing to simply downloading a burrito.

- Apple Pay improvements
- New app store screenshots
- General bug fixes
We heard your feedback and have made some changes to make submitting an order easier. We’ve also been busy squashing bugs, including design tweaks and error message improvements.

- We fixed a pesky bug that didn’t let you get guac on the side with veggie entrees
- General bug fixes

- Updates for iPhone X: Improved Menu and Checkout design
- Fixed an issue where Apple Pay was not selectable
- General bug fixes

- Improvements to card management in the wallet, including fixing a pesky bug that displayed gift card balances incorrectly
- Improved messaging to assist with in-restaurant payments
- User experience enhancements on the submit order screen
- Additional small bug fixes

- Made improvements to the order summary screen
- Improved the guest checkout experience
- Display improvements for iPhone X
- General bug fixes

- Quickly add Chips, Chips & Guac, or a Drink to your order in the bag to complete the perfect meal.
- Manage your subscription to Chipotle Offers & News. Look for it it in your account under Preferences. You can sign up for the occasional email or text.
- We've made your pickup time clearer after you've placed an order. You can also tap the pickup address for directions to your food rendezvous.
- Fixed an issue with reordering Veggie Burrito Bowls, Thanks to Lois in CA.
- Improved tap'ability and layout of navigation icons
- Display improvements throughout the app
- Minor improvements for iPhone X
- General bug fixes
- Bug fixes and stability improvements.

We might have lost you for a moment. This release we focused entirely on maps and restaurant selection. Thanks to everyone for the comments and feedback. Special thanks to zeppelinchick, Lolerboi, and Aylavue. Here’s the details:

- Set a Restaurant Preference and when you order, start with your Closest Chipotle, Most Recent, or Selected Favorite.
- Oh, and now you can save Favorite Chipotle restaurants now in the map.
- Tap your selected location on the homescreen to quickly see your Recents and Favorites.
- Our map has been completely rebuilt to help you find burrito bliss even quicker.
- Quickly see What’s Nearby and your Recent and Favorites by swiping up on the search bar in the map.
- If you’re further away from the nearest Chipotle than normal, which we know can be discomforting, search will work harder to show you a restaurant across a wider area. What a relief!

We might have lost you for a moment. This release we focused entirely on maps and restaurant selection. Thanks to everyone for the comments and feedback. Special thanks to zeppelinchick, Lolerboi, and Aylavue. Here’s the details:

- Set a Restaurant Preference and when you order, start with your Closest Chipotle, Most Recent, or Selected Favorite.
- Oh, and now you can save Favorite Chipotle restaurants now in the map.
- Tap your selected location on the homescreen to quickly see your Recents and Favorites.
- Our map has been completely rebuilt to help you find burrito bliss even quicker.
- Quickly see What’s Nearby and your Recent and Favorites by swiping up on the search bar in the map.
- If you’re further away from the nearest Chipotle than normal, which we know can be discomforting, search will work harder to show you a restaurant across a wider area. What a relief!
- Bug fixes and stability improvements.

- One for the kiddos- We fixed a bug with the kid’s menu that caused a crash.
- You can now scan a credit card when adding it to your Chipotle account.
- We added loading indicators in a few places so you can tell when the app is cooking something up for you.
- Added “Rate App” in the account screen, so you can leave us App Store feedback. We love hearing from you, let us know how we’re doing!
- Multiple display improvements for iPhone X
- General bug fixes
- If you search hard enough, the app might “Spill the beans”
Bug fixes and stability improvements.

Delivery! That’s right, wish granted. Order your favorites, recents, or go custom and we’ll bring it right on over. Straight to the doorstep. That’s a whole lotta power at your fingertips.

Features
- Save delivery addresses to speed things up.
- Your addresses live in the map with Chipotle restaurants.
- When we’re en route, tap “Where’s my food?” for more details.
- We also packed in general bug fixes

Heads-up
- There is a fee and order minimum for delivery.
- Fees and minimums are subject to change.
- Some areas may not have delivery, yet.
- Be awesome and tip your driver. They get 100% of it.
- Bug fixes and stability improvements.

We’ve been squashing bugs and taking names. Trust us, it looks pretty shiny under the hood. We’ve also laid the foundation for localized experiences and menu items that are just around the corner. Stay tuned for more.
Whoops—it seems we left out the extra tortillas option in our last release. You can now (again) order a tortilla on the side with your bowl or salad, or double-wrap your burrito.
Now serving: minor enhancements and bug fixes. We’ve also laid the groundwork to stay more connected with you. More exciting things to come!

Oh dang, it's been awhile. We've made it easier to keep tabs on delivery orders from our kitchen to your doorstep. You won't even have to leave the app! All you need is on the homescreen and for those that need MORE details (you know who you are), there's the newly improved order details. We've improved pickup instructions and gave Chipotlane locations (yup, drive up pickup) some love. We tuned up payment for speedy checkout, which means quicker burritos. Also bug fixes and tidying up.
Just tidying up with bug fixes and improvements.
Just tidying up with bug fixes and improvements.

In a word: Rewards. In more words: the deliciously-rewarding, points-for-eating-Chipotle experience you’ve been dreaming of (and asking for). That’s right, we finally did it. And now, our real food becomes real free, real fast. Earn points automatically for app orders, or by tapping the scan button and scanning your Rewards code before you pay in person. Oh yeah, and enrolling is easy. Just create a Chipotle account or tap JOIN NOW in the app if you’ve already got one. Next stop, Rewards.
Just tidying up with bug fixes and improvements.
Good news. We squashed some bugs this release, including the issue some of you experienced when ordering half and half proteins with Chorizo.
Use our new sticker pack to send some Chipotle love to your friends and family. Also included: bug fixes and stability improvements.
Bug fixes and stability improvements.

We're excited to release our updated menu design. Scroll down to it and you'll find our classic entrées along with your recents & favorites. Oh, and FREE delivery between December 17 - January 7. That's just in time for BOWL season. HA, see what we did there?
Bug fixes and stability improvements
Bug fixes and stability improvements

Oh dang, it's been awhile. We've made it easier to keep tabs on delivery orders from our kitchen to your doorstep. You won't even have to leave the app! All you need is on the homescreen and for those that need MORE details (you know who you are), there's the newly improved order details. We've improved pickup instructions and gave Chipotlane locations (yup, drive up pickup) some love. We tuned up payment for speedy checkout, which means quicker burritos. Also bug fixes and tidying up.

All new Lifestyle Bowls! Reach your health goals with our new bowls. Try a new Keto Salad Bowl, Whole30® Salad Bowl, Paleo Salad Bowl, High-Protein Bowl or try other plant-powered options like Vegan and Vegetarian. You'll be able to find them on the main menu right when you open the app. The What's New section is getting a rename to Featured. Look there for exclusive bowls that will only be around for a limited time. Lots of tidying up too, with bug fixes and improvements across the app.

Look there for exclusive bowls that will only be around for a limited time. Lots of tidying up too, with bug fixes and improvements across the app.

We’ve fixed a few things here and there. We hope you’re enjoying Chipotle Rewards. Haven’t joined? It's never too late to start earning points to score FREE Chipotle.

You're no longer limited to three customizations per meal. Yes, truth. All of you easy-on-everything'rs and dial-it-in perfectionists can order for pickup or delivery exactly how you would in a restaurant. Your order will be specially prepared by a dedicated team in our Delivery Kitchen to prepare your fully customized meal with care. And in other news, we're continuing to improve our delivery experience. We've also been busy with other fixes and improvements.

We recently lifted the limit on meal customizations. To... unlimited. So go crazy you easy-on-everything'rs and dial-it-in perfectionists and order your pickup or delivery exactly how you would in a restaurant. We've added a few stores you can order from, all of our Canada locations. And other fixes and improvements.

We recently lifted the limit on meal customizations. To... unlimited. So go crazy you easy-on-everything'rs and dial-it-in perfectionists and order your pickup or delivery exactly how you would in a restaurant. We've added a few stores you can order from, all of our Canada locations. And other fixes and improvements.

Wouldn't it be awesome if you could get your Chipotle without ever leaving your car? Good news, we've got you covered! Look for a Chipotlane location when placing a pick up order, select the Chipotlane pick up option and your food will be waiting for you at our drive-up window. If you like the classic pick up experience, we've still got that, too. Just decide at checkout what works best for you.

Wouldn't it be awesome if you could get your Chipotle without ever leaving your car? Good news, we've got you covered! Look for a Chipotlane location when placing a pick up order, select the Chipotlane pick up option and your food will be waiting for you at our drive-up window. If you like the classic pick up experience, we've still got that, too. Just decide at checkout what works best for you.

We've added Group Orders to the app! Just tap the Group Order button and share your link via text or email to your friends or family. Your lucky guests can place their order by following the link to group-order-burrito-bliss. Group orders work seamlessly as pickup or delivery orders. We also worked out a few kinks along the way with other fixes and improvements.

We've added Group Orders to the app! Just tap the Group Order button and share your link via text or email to your friends or family. Your lucky guests can place their order by following the link to group-order-burrito-bliss. Group orders work seamlessly as pickup or delivery orders. We also worked out a few kinks along the way with other fixes and improvements.

We’ve been at work improving our gift card experience. When your gift card is running low you can combine its balance with another saved card or Apple Pay to complete you order. We’ve also been at work improving the Group Order experience. Which we hope you have been enjoying with your CLOSE friends and family ;)

We've added our new Real Foodprint to your order details. The first radically transparent sustainability tracker of its kind, Real Foodprint shows you the positive impact you're helping make on the planet by choosing Chipotle's real, responsibly sourced ingredients versus conventional ones. That means you’re helping to lower the amount of carbon emitted, saving water, improving soil health, avoiding antibiotics, and supporting organic land. That’s the power of real ingredients.

With a fresh look, easy access to group orders, helpful messaging, and loads of other improvements, ordering Chipotle is easier than ever. Have a low gift card balance? Split your payment with another card. And we added an ADA-accessible pickup shelf preference, so everyone has easy access.

And…

Introducing the Rewards Exchange, an all-new Chipotle Rewards experience you’ve been dreaming of (and asking for). Chipotle Rewards members can now redeem points for a variety of rewards, from free burritos and guac to non-profit donations and Chipotle Goods.

From menu to checkout, we kept all the things you love about our app. Quick reorder, unlimited customizations, Real Foodprint—it’s all there. Just better.
